name: @e11community/rollbar-dynamic-config
description: GitHub Action to discover microservices in a repository

scripts.all: npm run build && npm run package
scripts.rebuild: ([ -d ./dist ] && rm -rf ./dist); ([ -d ./node_modules ] && rm -rf ./node_modules); NPM_CONFIG_UPDATE_NOTIFIER=false npm install --no-fund && tsc -p . && ncc build

author: Engineering 11
